name: Veyra
description: Born from the lingering essence of Aurelia, the Leafmother, Veyra is the youngest of the Verdant Kin. Unlike her kin who carry the weight of ages, Veyra embodies renewal and innocence. Her form glows softly, like a tender sprout breaking through barren soil, a sign that life on Zephyros may not be entirely lost. Though untested and fragile, her presence brings hope, whispers that the planet itself still dreams of awakening. Some see her as a child, others as a seed of destiny, for within her lies the untold future of Zephyros.
